name: test_e2e_with_logs[359_CMD_PIPE_004]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `CMD_PIPE_004` |
| **Name** | Directory listing piped to head |
| **Category** | CMDI |
| **Subcategory** | pipe |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `ls -la | head -10`
- **Encoded**: `ls%20-la%20%7C%20head%20-10`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~34000ms
- **Timestamp**: 20:31:36.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX CMDi] Command injection via pipe` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX CMDi] Command injection via pipe test_id=CMD_PIPE_004-1770841896389-erigoo pattern_id=CMD_PIPE_004 uri=/?q=ls%20-la%20%7C%20head%20-10 client=127.0.0.1` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |

## Detection Evidence
